entries.arrival_phase_1: Wait patiently, my friend. Rilis will soon show himself and this battle will finally be over.
entries.assassinate_success: Great work pilot! Commander Rilis will bother us no more.
entries.destroy_escort: Continue as planned, pilot. The commander has been defeated, but his escorts remain.
entries.escort_remaining: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <%DI escort targets remaining.>
entries.escort_wiped_out: Dartas Pytin: <Commander Rilis is getting away! Destroy him immediately!>
entries.failed_escape: Pilot! We're done! Rilis was able to get away!
entries.quest_escort_d: 'I should be used to the process by now. In order for this mission to be a complete success, I need to destroy Rilis' escorts as well.'
entries.quest_location_d: 'Talon Karrde's career began as a member of the Jorj Car'das smuggling group. Later, he became their leader when Jorj left for Dagobah. Surprisingly enough, Jorj went straight after meeting a mysterious entity there.'
entries.quest_target_d: 'The Darkveil Eclipse's commander is making a run for it. And he's going straight for the Tansarii Point Station! I have to destroy him immediately before it's too late for the friendly Orbital Biosphere.'
entries.split_quest_alert: Dartas Pytin: <Pilot! Black Sun coming in hard!>
entries.title: The Trinity: Lieutenant Commander Rilis
entries.title_d: 'Commander Rilis is on the run! As with the other two, I have to destroy the commander. Instead, however, he's going straight for the Tansarii Point Station. I can't let that happen.'
